Director: Roger Kumble
Starring: Sarah Michelle Gellar, Ryan Phillippe, Reece Witherspoon

Description: 

Sarah Michelle Gellar (The Grudge, Scooby-Doo, TV's "Buffy The Vampire Slayer") and Ryan Phillippe (I Know What You Did Last Summer, 54, Gosford Park) sizzle as a pair of unscrupulous siblings in a sexy tale of seduction, revenge and conquest.  After cleverly seducing and ruining the reputation of an unsuspecting classmate (Selma Blair, Hellboy, The Sweetest Thing), the sparks fly when Kathryn (Gellar) poses the ultimate challenge to her insatiable stepbrother Sebastian (Phillippe): deflower the headmaster's beautiful, virgin daughter Annette (Reese Witherspoon, Vanity Fair, Legally Blonde, Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde). If he fails, Kathryn gets his most prized possession, but if he succeeds, Sebastian gets to possess and bed Kathryn.  The stakes are high but for Sebastian, the payoff is feverishly irresistible and before the summer's over, no one will escape their relentless game of cat and mouse... until one of them is bitten by the most unlikely sensation of all... love.
